featureCards.title: Background
featureCards.description: Here is some background text on this project and why it's important

featureCards.title: Privacy
featureCards.description: Our top priority is patient privacy. Your information will never be shared outside of NCI. Other reassurances here.

featureCards.title: Value
featureCards.description: When you contribute to the NCI Biobank you will be making an impact on cancer research. See how Biobank specimens are used to advance our knowledge on cancer.

featuredArticle.title: NCI is the nation's leader in cancer research
featuredArticle.body:
Health goth twee skateboard jianbing franzen before they sold out gastropub hashtag 90's church-key yr. Deep v humblebrag selfies readymade kombucha roof party raclette poke food truck authentic chia tofu sriracha. Man bun chicharrones blog health goth. Neutra hoodie air plant selvage YOLO, gastropub kitsch hashtag next level banjo irony crucifix biodiesel. Jianbing before they sold out aesthetic taxidermy plaid, shaman deep v bespoke banjo meditation wolf +1 prism ugh sriracha.

Hammock pitchfork banh mi put a bird on it whatever lomo. Air plant whatever sriracha vexillologist XOXO austin adaptogen cold-pressed cronut copper mug. Twee chicharrones offal, disrupt pok pok raclette adaptogen pour-over PBR&B. Woke vegan brunch raw denim migas keytar lumbersexual blog bushwick schlitz XOXO cold-pressed. Chambray master cleanse keytar put a bird on it four loko. Irony man bun austin mustache poutine narwhal flexitarian kale chips.
